description: This file defines an Angular service called ThemeService that manages the application's theme preference, specifically toggling between dark and light themes. It interacts with localStorage to persist user preference and updates the document's body classes accordingly.

classes.name: ThemeService
classes.description: An Angular service that maintains the global theme state and updates the DOM class list to reflect the current theme, persisting preferences across sessions.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the theme based on stored preferences and applies the theme.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the theme between dark and light, updates localStorage, and reapplies the theme.

methods.name: applyTheme
methods.description: Applies the current theme by toggling the CSS class on the document body.
